properties.description: A warm, welcoming, safe place with free hot drinks andÂ biscuits. There is ample parking nearby, and there is a toilet available. We have wool and knitting needles if people want to learn to knit

properties.address: Finborough Road, Stowmarket IP14 1PN, UK
properties.description: Our clubhouse is offering a welcoming warm space on Monday and Tuesday mornings to anyone who might need it. Monday: 'Coffee and Company' 10.00 to12.00. Tuesday: 'Community Hub' for those with disabilities and dementia (and carers) and those who might need some company, 10.00 to 12.00. Soup and a roll alternate weeks.
properties.title: WARM SPACES - Rookery Bowling Club

properties.address: Woolpit Room Christian Fellowship - Woolpit Room, White Elm Road, Woolpit, Bury Saint Edmunds IP30 9SQ, UK
properties.description: Friendly Warm Space. Save on your own heating - come and enjoy free soup and a roll and some good company in the warm! Feel free to bring your knitting, games, puzzles etc. Help with transport available. (Warm Space funded with the help of Babergh/Mid Suffolk District Council).
properties.title: WARM SPACES - Woolpit Room

properties.address: Westgate Street, Bury Saint Edmunds IP33 1QR, UK
properties.description: "Theatre Royal is opening its doors for Toasty Tuesdays throughout the winter. If rising costs are causing concerns about staying warm at home this winter, we invite you to our Community Hub in our CafÃ© area at Theatre Royal. Everyone is welcome. We have hot food and drinks, wheelchair access with accessible toilets and device charging. We are also a child friendly space with buggy park and changing stations available."
properties.title: WARM SPACES - Theatre Royal Bury St Edmunds

properties.address: Consent Lane, Ipswich IP7 7SB, UK
properties.description: A friendly place to go in the warm where you can have a hot drink and something to eat at reasonable prices. All ages catered for. A variety of activities are provided - play cards or board games or just sit and read, or have a snooze, the choice is yours. On Wednesdays - Light lunches and afternoon teas, on Sundays - Breakfast snacks, cakes etc. (Warm Space supported by Babergh District Council Community Grants).
properties.title: WARM SPACES - Bildeston Sportsfield Pavilion
